languages.text: "Это истинное исчадие! Даже находиться рядом с ним невыносимо! Мне кажется, даже те, кто лишен блага Омниссии, ощущают ее влияние на себе... чудовищная мощь, употребленная на нечестивые исчисления и хаотические калькуляции! Что бы не изрыгнул из себя этот когитатор в конце своего цикла, ни один праведник не должен воспринять этого!"

traits.locale_text: "Это... это исчадие... даже находиться рядом с ним невыносимо! Мне кажется, даже те, кто лишен блага Омниссии, ощущают ее влияние на себе... чудовищная мощь, употребленная на нечестивые исчисления и хаотические калькуляции! Что бы не изрыгнул из себя этот когитатор в конце цикла, ни один праведник не должен воспринять этого!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"
languages.original_text: "Это истинное исчадие! Даже находиться рядом с ним невыносимо! Мне кажется, даже те, кто лишен блага Омниссии, ощущают ее влияние на себе... чудовищная мощь, употребленная на нечестивые исчисления и хаотические калькуляции! Что бы не изрыгнул из себя этот когитатор в конце своего цикла, ни один праведник не должен воспринять этого!"

traits.locale_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilized for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

traits.locale_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilized for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"

Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

traits.locale_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “那是一头真正的怪物！光是站在它附近就已经让人受不了了！我相信，哪怕是那些被剥夺了欧姆尼塞亚的恩典的人，也同样会感觉到它的影响……它拥有巨大的力量，用于计算邪恶与混沌！虽然我不知道那台沉思者计算结束之后会喷出什么样的结果，但正义的灵魂绝对不该接受它献上的可憎祭品！”
languages.original_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"

traits.locale_text: “那是一头真正的怪物！光是站在它附近就已经让人受不了了！我相信，哪怕是那些被剥夺了欧姆尼塞亚的恩典的人，也同样会感觉到它的影响……它拥有巨大的力量，用于计算邪恶与混沌！虽然我不知道那台思考器计算结束之后会喷出什么样的结果，但正义的灵魂绝对不该接受它献上的可憎祭品！”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «¡Es una auténtica abominación! ¡Es insufrible incluso encontrarse en sus cercanías! Creo que incluso aquellos privados de la gracia del Omnissiah pueden sentir su influencia sobre ellos... ¡su monstruosa potencia dedicada a computaciones sacrílegas y cálculos corruptos! No importa lo que el cogitador escupa al final de su ciclo, ¡ningún alma justa debe aceptar su ofrenda envenenada!».
languages.original_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es una auténtica abominación! ¡Es insufrible incluso encontrarse en sus cercanías! Creo que incluso aquellos privados de la gracia del Omnissiah pueden sentir su influencia sobre ellos... ¡su monstruosa potencia dedicada a computaciones sacrílegas y cálculos corruptos! No importa lo que el cogitador escupa al final de su ciclo, ¡ningún alma justa debe aceptar su ofrenda envenenada!».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「まさに忌まわしきものでした！近くに立つことさえ耐え難い！万機神の恩寵を奪われた者でさえ、いまだにその影響を感じているはずです…その怪物的な力は、不浄の計算や混沌の計算に利用されているのです！考算機がそのサイクルの終わりに何を吐き出そうとも、正義の魂はその凶悪な供物を受け入れるべきではありません！」
languages.original_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"

traits.locale_text: 「まさに忌まわしきものでした！近くに立つことさえ耐え難い！万機神の恩寵を奪われた者でさえ、いまだにその影響を感じているはずです…その怪物的な力は、不浄の計算や混沌の計算に利用されているのです！考算機がそのサイクルの終わりに何を吐き出そうとも、正義の魂はその凶悪な供物を受け入れるべきではありません！」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Sie ist eine wahre Abscheulichkeit! Schon in ihrer Nähe zu stehen, ist unerträglich! Ich glaube, selbst jene, denen die Gunst des Omnissiah aberkannt wurde, spüren immer noch ihren Einfluss ... diese monströse Macht, die in unheilige und chaotische Berechnungen fließt! Was auch immer dieser Cogitator am Ende seines Zyklus ausspuckt, keine rechtschaffene Seele sollte sein ruchloses Angebot annehmen!"
languages.original_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie ist eine wahre Abscheulichkeit! Schon in ihrer Nähe zu stehen, ist unerträglich! Ich glaube, selbst jene, denen die Gunst des Omnissiah aberkannt wurde, spüren immer noch ihren Einfluss ... diese monströse Macht, die in unheilige und chaotische Berechnungen fließt! Was auch immer dieser Cogitator am Ende seines Zyklus ausspuckt, keine rechtschaffene Seele sollte sein ruchloses Angebot annehmen!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « C'est une véritable abomination, si odieuse qu'il est insupportable de se tenir à côté ! Je pense que même ceux qui ont été privés de la grâce de l'Omnimessie continuent à sentir son influence... Son monstrueux pouvoir utilisé pour des opérations impies et des calculs chaotiques ! Quoi que ce cogitateur puisse produire une fois son cycle terminé, les âmes vertueuses doivent se garder d'accepter son infâme offrande ! »
languages.original_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est une véritable abomination, si odieuse qu'il est insupportable de se tenir à côté ! Je pense que même ceux qui ont été privés de la grâce de l'Omnimessie continuent à sentir son influence... Son monstrueux pouvoir utilisé pour des opérations impies et des calculs chaotiques ! Quoi que ce cogitateur puisse produire une fois son cycle terminé, les âmes vertueuses doivent se garder d'accepter son infâme offrande ! »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Sahiden bir garabet! Yanında durmaya dahi tahammül edilmiyor! Hermesih'in lütfundan mahrum kalmışların bile onun nüfuzunu hissettiğine inanırım... Fakat yüce kudreti, meşum işlemler ve Kaos'a hizmet eden hesaplamalar için kullanılıyor! O kavramsayarın döngüsü tamamlandığında ağzından ne çıkarsa çıksın, ahlak sahibi hiçbir ruhun o fena adağı kabul etmemesi gerekir!"
languages.original_text: "It is a true abomination! Even standing near it is unbearable! I believe that even those who have been deprived of the Omnissiah's grace still feel its influence on them... its monstrous power utilised for unholy computations and chaotic calculations! Whatever that cogitator might spew out at the end of its cycle, no righteous soul should accept its heinous offering!"

traits.locale_text: “Sahiden bir garabet! Yanında durmaya dahi tahammül edilmez! Hermesih'in lütfundan mahrum kalmışların bile onun nüfuzunu hissettiğine inanırım... Fakat yüce kudreti, meşum işlemler ve kaosa hizmet eden hesaplamalar için kullanılıyor! O kavramsayar işlemini tamamladığında ağzından ne çıkarsa çıksın, ahlak sahibi hiçbir ruhun o fena adağı kabul etmemesi gerekir!”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest
